page.title: 11Clubs in March
page.content: In our area there is the{Neale Wade {Community Centre}where lots of clubs meet such as the{Chess Club, Camera {Club, Floral Arrangement Club, Radio {Club, Riding Club, Badminton Club, {Pottery Club, Youth Club, Keep Fit, {Bridge Club, Day Club, Happy {Pensioners Club, Old Time Dancers {Club, Anglian Players Drama Group, {Blue Bird Club, Saint Raphael Club, {Isle of Ely Society for the Blind, {Cambridgeshire and Isle of Ely {Naturalist's Trust, the Music Society and the{March Operatic Society.}There are also{evening classes}held here. A{stamp club}meets monthly to buy and swap stamps and we also have an {Athletic club}in March which meets at {Estover Road}field. Finally we have an {Adventurer's club}for children up to 11 at{St.John's Church Hall. Natalie Wise, Claire Bright, Gary Wing
